item.title: ‘Volcano Live!’ Sees Nik Wallenda Appease The Gods – And Anger Some Fans
item.description: Daredevil Nik Wallenda took on the active Masaya Volcano in Nicaragua this evening in an ABC special, Volcano Live! As the title suggests, the highwire walker attempted an 1,800-foot walk over the …

item.title: Video: Hardik Pandya slams 105 off 39 balls and announces his return
item.description: Hardik Pandya returns to the field with an array of sixes and fours. He smashed his way to a century within 39 balls at DY Patil T20 World Cup.
